Hi Tony,

We have written Solr Index Writer Processor and would make it ava=
ilable soon to Heritrix community soon. We will get it by end of this month=
. If you need earlier then that let me know. We will  try to get this  at a=
n earlier date as well.

--Thanks and Regards
Vaijanath N. Rao

Subject: [archive-crawler] Heritrix Freelancer=
 needed






Hi, 

Just wanted to hire someone to work on my Heritrix/Solr=
 integration project. Basically, I would like to have a Heritrix writer tha=
t can write the crawl data to MySQL and/or an XML file that feeds Solr inde=
xing. 

If anyone is interested, please reply to me only at ivytony[at] gma=
il.com with your rate and quote. I apologize to those who feel bothered by =
this message. 

Thanks! 

Tony
